{"id":625166865,"lang":"cpp","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1642845077,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/625166865/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s.size()==0){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        vector<int> cnt(128,0);\n        int n=0;\n        int left=0,right=0;\n        int ma = 0;\n        while(right<=s.size()){\n            if(n==0){\n                ma = max(ma,right-left-1);\n                if(cnt[s[right]]==0){\n                    cnt[s[right++]]++;\n                }\n                else{\n                    cnt[s[right++]]++;\n                    n++;\n                }\n            }\n            else{\n                if(cnt[s[left]]>=2){\n                    cnt[s[left++]]--;\n                    n--;\n                }\n                else{\n                    cnt[s[left++]]--;\n                }\n            }   \n        }\n        return ma+1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
